1.content:
BEEP. BEEP. BEEP.

Your alarm went off, loud, obnoxious, just the way they should be.

"Ughh..." you moaned, your female voice swearing under it's breath.

"I'm up, I'm up!"

You turned off the alarm and sighed. "I really need to change the alarm to music...or, something that isn't obnoxious beeping."

You stood up and fixed your bed. Your light pink bed. In these years of living as a teenage girl, you've (annoyingly enough) grown used to having pink everywhere in your room.

You changed into jeans, a light blue polo shirt, and sandals, and fixed your hair.

As you were preparing a quick breakfast for yourself (in the form of an adult female, which, according to all new legal records you managed to create, is your mother) you saw something out of the ordinary on the news. There was a report about a bank robbery, and the suspected criminal was one of the nicest guys ever to work for the mayor.

"I guess people really aren't what they seem to be..." you said, giggling, as you placed your meal on the table and ate, referring to the fact you were, in fact, not what you seemed to be.

Finishing your meal, you stormed out the door and got in your car, but not before turning back into yourself (or rather, this teenage girl, but for the sake of simplicity, this form will be referred to as you.)
1.title: Just another morning.

11.content:
As you pulled up to the parking lot of your high school, you noticed there was a car in your usual spot. Ugh, I guess someone hasn't learned that's where I park... you thought to yourself.

You parked in the next available spot and decided to look at the car in question to see who's it was. As you approached it, a teenage boy who seemed to be just a year older than you, walked up to you.

"Oh, crap, was that your spot?" he asked, a grin on his face.

"Uh, yeah, it was." you said with an annoying tone.

"Damn, well, I guess it's mine now." he smirked and went in to grab something.

You walked away, annoyed, hoping this day will get better.


The teenager, however, remained in his car for a bit longer. He pulled out a giant wad of cash, kissed it, and placed it in the glovebox, where a gun was also in hiding.

AUTHOR'S NOTE:

This is where you get to go across into two completely different stories, set in the same universe.
You could follow the criminal's story and life, in which you will explore everything through his eyes, or..
You can remain being Justin/Jennifer, and explore everything through his eyes.

You will remain in that character's POV for the remainder of this interactive story. Storylines can, might, and will be crossed between the two "timelines," but you cannot start controlling the character you didn't pick midway through the story.

Also, both the criminal, currently unnamed as of this post, and Justin/Jennifer (who from this post onward shall just be referred to as Jennifer) cannot die. They can be injured, but nothing fatal.
11.title: You arrive at school...

choices: Try getting close to the girl, but in another way.
111.content:
"Easiest $6,000 I ever made!" you chuckled to yourself, as you remained seated in your car. You cocked your head from side to side and took a glance at yourself in the rearview mirror. You poked and pulled at your face as though it wasn't yours, wondering whether it was yet time for another change. You then glanced at the girl now walking away from you, and you arched an eyebrow at the sight of her pert little ass. "Not bad!" you muttered, oblivious to the fact that the 'girl' hadn't been born a girl (oblivious that she was the only other person like yourself)

Starting the car up for a moment, you then changed your mind and switched the engine off before getting back out of the car. You decided to follow the girl and maybe annoy her a little more.

Or perhaps you wanted to something else, taking advantage of your unique ability?
111.title: Follow the criminal's POV.

choices: Go on a date with the wealthy man in the resturant.
Rob the jewlery store as a mid 20s woman in a wedding gown.
Rob the jewlery store as a 10 year old boy.
1112.content:
"I'll knock you up later, sweetheart," you said to yourself, watching the girl walk away.

You pulled out of the driveway and decided to drive around the city, still in this teenage boy's form, looking for entertainment and havok to cause.

Glancing around at the passers by, you realized you could turn into one of them and have a little fun.

You looked through a resturant window to find a man, who, by his looks, was extremely wealthy. He looked upset and it seemed like he was stood up. "Maybe I can be his date and milk all the money outta him," you said to yourself.

Nearby was a jewelery store. "I could always rob that," you said to yourself. "But what form would I take..."
1112.title: Nah, do something else.

11121.content:
After glancing across at a blonde woman in a red dress and silver, strappy sandals, you concentrated and morphed yourself into her exact image. You were now a 33-year old woman (at least in form), and you rocked steadily on your stilettos as you looked down at yourself, gabbing your boobs briefly. "Not bad!" you muttered, as you tottered into the restaurant in your heels.

"Now, where's he gone?" you mumbled, looking around at the wealthy looking guy you had just seen. "Ahh...there's my free ride!" you then grinned using your new features, sashaying over to the man's table, wiggling your curvy new hips.

"This seat taken?" you purred in the woman's voice, then sitting down before he could even answer.

"Hi, I'm Sarah! And I have to say...you are incredibly cute!" you giggled, brushing your hair out of your face and acting as feminine as you could, helped by the fact that you now had an impressive cleavage to flash at him.

The man just...
11121.title: Go on a date with the wealthy man in the restur...

choices: Go find more crime to do.
Go to bed and find more fun crimes to do in the morning.
11122.content:
You decided to rob the store, but you couldn't seem to find a good enough or interesting form to take. While driving around looking for a form to take, you spotted a wedding going on.

The bride and groom were just leaving the wedding, and she looked absolutely excited. As you watched them drive away, you drove back to the jewelry store and turned into the woman, wedding gown and all.

You stepped out of your car and grinned, walking inside, with a gun strapped to your new sexy leg, which was hidden from view thanks to the dress. When you reached the counter you took out the gun and smashed them all in with it, which was held by dainty, manicured hands and a new wedding ring. You stole as much as you can, hopped in the car and drove away, smiling at the loot you got. You were smart enough to park where there were no security cameras, so the car you're in would never be tracked down.

You pulled up to your house, still in the wedding gown, and drove into the garage, closing it behind you. From there you removed the plates in the car with new ones, just to be safe.

You shapeshifted to a early 20s brunette woman in professional wear (a white blouse, black pencil skirt, and black high heels) and stepped outside through the side door and went to your mailbox, grabbing mail which was all addressed to "Megan McFadden;" bills, news magazines, pointless credit card offers, and a few magazines, namely Teen Vogue, People, Women's Health, and the new Victoria's Secret catalog.

You stepped inside, but not before waving at the friendly elderly couple tending to their gardens next door. You sighed. "Finally home," you said to yourself. You tossed all the mail in the garbage and sat down to watch some football, kicking off your heels and sitting on the couch like a guy.

The owner of this home? Megan McFadden. Who was she? She didn't exist. Well, she does in a way. You're her. Your real identity, Andrew Chadwick, already has a warrant out for it's arrest and you couldn't risk buying a home under that name. To further keep up appearances, you subscribed to mail "Megan" would normally subscribe to.

But who was Megan? Sure, she didn't exist, but who was she? She was a 22 year old receptionist at an office that doesn't exist, which explains why you would always shapeshift into her in professional wear when going home. You couldn't risk ever robbing or committing crimes in this form, as without it you're homeless.
11122.title: Rob the jewlery store as a mid 20s woman in a w...

111222.content:
You went to your bedroom (which was decorated like any 22 year old woman's would be) and changed into one of your old guy shirts. Megan, or rather, the new you, was only 5'2, while your old guy you was 6'4, so your old shirts fit perfectly as nightgowns/sleepwear.

You went to sleep, excited about the new crimes you get to commit tomorrow.

The next morning you woke up and got ready for the day, dressed once again in professional wear (this time a black dress with heels) and made yourself breakfast. The kitchen, along with every other part of the house, was filled with high end appliances that you were able to buy thanks to all the money you rake in from your crimes.

You sat down at the kitchen table and decided what to do today, and then you decided on one of two things.

Either:
A: Steal a plane ticket and go on a weekend vacation with someone's family (in that person's place)

B: Or go down a simpler route and just steal a car.
111222.title: Go to bed and find more fun crimes to do in the...

1112221.content:
A grin appeared on your pretty new face as you made your decision. And after having a mug of coffee you headed out to the garage and got into your car. Securing yourself in the car with your seatbelt...you then glanced in the rear view mirror and brushed your long hair out of your face, smirking as you did so. You felt 'untouchable', and indeed you were. "Vacation time!!" you then exclaimed in your sexy voice, before driving out of the garage and into the street, the chasis of the car scraping the asphalt as it left the driveway.

Once at your local airport you had a look around, there were certainly no shortage of shapes to shift into. Lots of couples going on honeymoons, families going on vacation, and even individuals just eager to get away from their humdrum lives for a while.

You parked your car in a relatively secluded area and then briskly walked to the main terminal, trying to appear as 'feminine' as you could to maintain your appearance. It didn't take long once you were inside to spot the person you wanted to become for the new few days...maybe. There was a good looking blonde woman in her mid thirties, silky smooth hair past her shoulders, and she was wearing a white top, a pink cardigan, khaki capris and a pair of heeled sandals. "Look honey, just take the kids and head to the plane okay, I'll catch up" you heard the woman say to her husband, who was leading their two children around by the hand.

"Perfect!" you chuckled, "And...kind of careless too" you added, when you saw the woman rest her tickets and purse on the counter while she crouched down to adjust her right sandal. You took your chance and walked past the woman, your heels clicking on the floor as you went. "Thank you!" you mused...as you scooped up the woman's purse and plane tickets while nobody was paying attention. "Ooh, Tenerife here I come!" you said excitedly, peeking at the tickets.

You made a beeline for the woman's family, and as you walked around a pillar...you quickly shifted into the woman's form. A quick glance back at your doppleganger brought another smirk to your face, and then you disappeared from view, leaving her there. "Ready honey?" you said to the woman's husband, patting him hard on the ass as you past.

Your new husband frowned a little, and then ushered his kids onto the aircraft after you.
1112221.title: A.

11122211.content:
A few minutes later, the plane was in the air, with you and your temporarily new family onboard.
"I needed this," you muttered to yourself and smiling.
Your new husband looked at you and smiled as he grabbed your hand. "I'm sure you did sweetie. You've worked hard at the office and you definitely need a break."

"Yeah...that's so true. Work is stressful!" which wasn't a lie. As fun as it was committing crimes, it can also be stressful. Making sure you're not caught can be difficult.

You closed your eyes and leaned back against the seat, smiling, knowing that these people have no idea their loving wife and mother isn't even on the plane with them.
11122211.title: A smooth take-off.

111222111.content:
You were woken up some time later by a hand that was caressing your thigh. A big scowl appeared on your face as you looked down and saw the woman's husband getting a little 'frisky' with you. "Hey...stop that!" you said, pushing his hand away.

"What?? Y...you normally like that honey" the man replied.

"Yeah well...not on the plane sweetheart" you told him straight. The last thing you wanted was this guy getting horny and wanting to make out with you. You rested your head back again and closed your eyes, leaving your new husband sat there, not knowing what to do with his hands. In the end he just rested them in his lap and started admiring the air stewardesses as they walked back and forth down the aisle.

"Damn, need to pee!" you suddenly grumbled to yourself, opening your eyes again.

"Out the way, bathroom break!" you said, stumbling over 'your' husband and falling into one of the stewardesses, a 23-year old cute blonde. As the two of you went sprawling, your face landed inches away from her chest, and a grin appeared on your face. "Oooh...hello girls!" you smirked.

The stewardess just frowned at you, and instantly thought "Lesbian!"

"Honey?" your new husband said, as he helped you to your feet.

"Uh...sorry!" you apologized to the air stewardess, as you watched her scramble to her feet. You then excused yourself and headed to the bathroom at the back end of the plane, while the other passengers all smiled in amusement at what had just happened.
111222111.title: Later, during the plane ride...

1112221111.content:
You got into the bathroom and locked the door. Instantly, you caught a glimpse of yourself in the small mirror. You have an angelic face which frames your button nose, beautiful eyes and a smile which radiates maternal love. Your cheeks are a bit chubby, but overall you still looked far younger that your real age. You pinched your cheek and flashed an evil grin. The sensation of stealing another person’s identity excited and titillated your whole body, making you squeal in delight.

You sit on the toilet seat and start relieving your bladder, wondering on how you’re going to carry on your masquerade for the rest of the trip. You didn’t know anything about the woman you impersonated. You reached your purse and fished out a wallet. Inside, you found an identity card. You took it out and read it.

Your current name is Hannah Pritchett, born thirty-two years ago. So far, those are the only relevant information you can extract from your ID card. You took out Hannah’s - now yours – cellphone from the purse. Luckily, the real Hannah didn’t protect her device with password. You browsed over the files and found out one file entitled ‘Personal’. It took you less than five minutes to learn most of the information about your new life.

You have done this before in the past when you took other people identities. You smiled as you recalled the time when you spent a weekend impersonating Libby, Jennifer Wesker’s friend in the cheerleader squad. As Jennifer Wesker, you learned that Libby was pregnant with her boyfriend, Scott. When her parents learned about it, they sent her back to her grandmother’s home back in the country. Knowing that Scott was not informed about this, you used the opportunity to change into Libby and went with him to the arcade and mall. Scott was a good kid and you had a nice weekend with him, making love in the his family’s condominium. You remember that back then, you didn’t even learn anything about Libby. You just relied on your improvisation skills and Scott didn’t have a clue that his girlfriend of two years was not herself.
1112221111.title: Relieving yourself.

choices: more recollection on your time observing Justin/Jennifer
11122211112.content:
You were delighted as you recalled your 'adventure' as Jennifer Wesker and her friend, Libby. Yes. You have been aware of the secret life conducted by the Justin Webb a.k.a. Jennifer Wesker, the bubbly cheerleader. You have learned about his whereabouts for several months now and you managed to infiltrate the school, posing as teachers, school staff, and students.

You knew that he had created a false family to settle down and avoiding the spotlight. You took the pleasure of knowing that Justin was totally oblivious about you. You even tried to disguise yourself to get close to 'Jennifer'. There were at least three times you tried to approach her as someone else. First as a jock named Martin who accidentally met Jennifer in a club. Then as a nerd who approached her at the city library when she was researching for school paper and then as Jennifer's various friends at the school. Jennifer's besties in the cheerleader squad are your favorite choice. You have become Maria Peretti,the petite raven-haired cheers; Yumiko Namada, one of Jennifer's closest confidante and Elizabeth McEnroe - or the notorious Libby. She was the wildest girl out of all the gang.

As Libby, you managed to establish good relationship with 'Jennifer'. With Yumiko and Maria, you went to concerts and held pajama parties together. With meticulous planning, you found it easy to juggle between identities. Sometimes you became Maria and hung out with Yumiko or posed as Yumiko and study together with Maria.

As you got closer to Jennifer, you found out that sometimes, - whenever Justin/Jennifer was busy with his other identities - you could turn yourself into Jennifer and go out with the real Libby. It started with visiting the mall together, then you went to parties and even to other cities. In one of those trips, Libby told you that she was pregnant and she wasn't ready for the consequences. She said that her parents would have her fly abroad. When you learned about this, you consoled your friend and told her that everything would be alright. As you hugged Libby, you already concocted a plan to impersonate her while she's gone.

She didn't notice your evil smile.

It was the same smile flashing on your Hannah Pritchett's face as you emerged from the toilet It just took seconds to walk back to your seat, where your 'family' sat. But in those seconds, you have recalled a brief summary on your life as characters around Justin Webb/Jennifer Wesker. Justin/Jennifer never realized that you have been very close. If you wanted, you could create a lot of troubles in his life.

But it can wait.

Right now, you just enjoyed this plane ride.
11122211112.title: Libby's story

choices: Your new parents show you to your new room
1113.content:
You stared at this girl you just spoke to with curiosity. You felt an interest in her, unaware it's because she was also one with special abilities just like yourself. Despite your usual spree of negativity, you actually wanted to befriend her. The very idea of this disgusted you as you didn't need friends, but at the same time you were fond of the idea.

"I need to find a way to get close to her..." you said to yourself.

As you sat in your car you watched the principal of the school leave the school building and off campus.

You morphed into an exact copy of him and went into the school building, knowing exactly what you plan to do.

You walked into the principals office and sat down at his chair, looking around the room for a way to learn more about her. Seeing that the computer was logged into the school system, you looked up the girl's license plate, knowing it would be in the school system since students need a permit to park on school grounds.

"Jennifer Wesker..."

You looked up her school schedule and extra-curricular activities and saw she was also a cheerleader. "Damn, you just keep getting more hot," you whispered.

You knew if you wanted to get close to her you'd need to become a student yourself. You looked up the attendance list of the school and saw there was a girl who hasn't showed up in weeks. Curious as to why, you called up her parents (under the guise of the school principal to find out why.

"Sorry sir, it's just...she ran away a few weeks ago. She left a note saying she ran away to New York City to start a new life for herself."
"Oh, I'm sorry to hear that," you lied. You hung up and started looking up her information and saw she had a lot of classes with Jennifer and was also a cheerleader.

You looked at the girl's photo once more, and then again at the name. Macie Johnson. You smiled and shapeshifted into an exact copy of her, crossing your legs as you leaned back in the principal's chair. You were now wearing a pink shirt, a short denim skirt and black high heels.

You brushed your new blonde hair out of your face and left the principal's office, but not before writing down the address of your new home. Teetering in your new shoes, you decided to sneak into the gym lockers first. You found a locker that that open and stole a pair of flats from it and slipped them on. "Ha, be more careful with your stuff," you smiled.

You left the school building and, half an hour later, found the address you had written down. You walked towards the door, your heels in your hand and the paper with the address on it in another.

You rang the doorbell and the girl's mother opened the door. She saw you and her eyes widened. She called her husband over and they both stared at you with shock.

"Mom, dad... I'm home." you said with a genuine smile.
1113.title: Try getting close to the girl, but in another way.

112.content:
You glance back, noticing the guy, checking you out as you walk away.

"First he parks in my spot, then he checks me out." you think, though you can't really blame him you had to admit you were a very attractive girl, you were especially proud of your butt, as Feminine as that sounded.

You headed to gym, you first class of the day.

You arrive at the gym, and sit on the bleachers talking with some of your cheerleader friends until the first bell rings.

You all head to the locker room to change, this is the only good part about gym class.

Even though you're a girl, you're still definitely a straight male on the inside, which would make you a lesbian. You haven't explained this to anyone else for fear of losing your friends, so you still pretend to be a straight girl.

As you take off your jeans and polo shirt you get to watch all the girls around you strip to their bra and panties, though its a bit different now that you are wearing the same thing, under your jeans are a pair of baby-blue boyshorts, under your polo is a white bra, size 34 D.

Sometimes you wonder why you had chosen to make your new life a hot teenage girl, sure life as a kid again was nice, and even the idea of being the opposite gender, but ignoring all that, you could've made yourself average, but no, you became this petite, blond with big breasts and a nice butt.

Turning away you unclasp your bra, and slip on your sports bra, Gym is the one downside to having such large breasts, you could shrink them down during Gym, but the one time you did that all the girls quickly took notice and either thought you were padding, or that you had a really good sports bra, and you didn't need all the attention so now you just keep them the same all the time.

Finally putting on your gym Uniform, a Green T-shirt and Blue Short shorts.

All changed, you slip on your gym shoes, pink tennis shoes, and you follow the girls back out to the gym, tying your hair up in a high ponytail. You wonder what your doing today
112.title: Follow Jennifer's POV.

1121.content:
Accidentally began this route under 'Something Else' when I had meant to begin it here, please delete the chapter 'Something Else'
---
You have a choice between going offsite to practise gymnastics or go outside and participate in group sports as it was sunny that day.
There were several perks of being a shapeshifter that you knew you shouldn't use as much as you did, on of those was this: in the palm of your hand, you materialise a coin... you glance at it... tails. Sounds like you were staying on-site.
You say goodbye to your friends as they wave you goodbye before shuffling slowly to the school play-field.
The girls left behind were excited and talkative, trying to figure out what sports they might be doing. You loitered way behind on the way there, minding your own business when the Earth seemed to shake and spin... and shake and spin... and shake and spin and then spin and shake and.
You were a guy.
You were 21 year old Justin Webb.
You were 21 year old Justin Webb wearing the clothes of 17 year old Jennifer Wesker, a girl.
Nobody seemed to notice the disappearance of Jennifer, except your friend Emily, who was the only person walking behind you. She noticed you, a guy, out of place and sticking out due to your girl's uniform. You morph back into Jennifer, unsure of why your powers had malfunctioned like this.

What to do about Emily?
1121.title: During Gym Class

11211.content:
*Nobody else
---

Emily stares at you, terrified. She was a very, very intelligent girl. There was no convincing her or duping her easily.
You walk closer, smiling. It was her meek, timid look you would take on. If you tried to remain as Jennifer Wesker, you might be putting yourself in greater danger.
But how could the government have found you? Why so suddenly? Why play that card now? What was going on, dammit?!
Your powers had never gone wrong before.

You sense the bones and muscles in your jaw crunching and grinding together into the form of Emily's sharp chin. Cracking, snapping, clicking, silently. When this happened three years ago, the effects were absolutely excruciating. Not anymore. You nestle your chin into your solar plexus and breathe slowly and deeply through your shrinking lips and mouth. Your swollen tongue becomes thin out and you suck back the sudden rush of saliva.
Your heart rate gradually rises and falls within your chest. What was once large, heavy chest. The balloons had been deflated. The fat, muscle and glandular tissue all flatten out by a most gradual and minute increment. The nipples themselves stay roughly the same size, you feel under Jennifer's large bra. You ignore this and look up at the breathless, horrified Emily. She seems to be growing taller until you realise that your head and perpendicular line of vision was shrinking as your heights matched. You feet become smaller, yet calloused and much firmer and more rigid than before. You need smaller shoes. Emily had done ballet to a high grade when she was younger, her feet would have to have been deformed slightly from that.
You blink.
Arms and legs shrinking. Becoming weaker. Emily's arms and legs.
You open your eyes to a display of crazy colours swirling around in your vision, like intensified hypnogogia.
You blink again and its gone. You resume approaching Emily, unfazed.
You adapt to the new sensations remarkably quickly, though a little disconcerted by the growth of a small bush of pubic hair under Jennifer's boy-shorts.
Your smile returns and you begin to giggle in a higher-pitched faster giggle than was customary for Jennifer. The air vibrates in her little body at a faster rate. You were not as good-looking as before. That was a fact.

Emily Darke was an academic prodigy. She excelled in all her school subjects and, despite being a first year student, there, had only turned fourteen recently. You could not even hope that you would be able to pretend to be Emily in class. But, she had not many real friends except for you, and it would be easy to mimic her mannerisms in hallways.
You had a plan that would not involve that at all. You had a plan that involved a new trick that no federal operative would ever see coming. You had a trick that would enable you to easily escape forever, leaving behind no trail at all.
You were still wearing Jennifer's clothes: her sports bra, boyshorts, pink shoes etc. You think about it for a second and the boyshorts melt into your thighs. Feeling Emily's bushier pubes presents a temporarily sensual experience, but you focus yourself and get back on track. Your concentration now was paramount.
The real Emily prepares to scream. It was too late, though. You launch your newer, daintier hand onto her shoulder and almost faint...
Instantly, you are wearing Emily's clothes, attracting them onto your skin with DNA flux, while transferring your own clothes onto where Emily's body had been. However, moving from your hand was pulsing, luminous tissue. The colour changes from a sickly green to the colour of skin, specifically, Jennifer's skin. The tissue stretches across Emily's body from your hands until it encased her completely, a cocoon of Jennifer's image. If you broke contact, however, you knew the skin would retract and the girl would become Emily. She would regain consciousness some time after you let go.
You bend over, paying attention to the different ways your new body handled such motions, and scoop the Jennifer-shell Emily and begin to move, as fast as you can despite the immense weight of that burden and your reduced arm strength.
In order to go faster, as you move, you convert subcutaneous fat into muscle. Thus, in a very small amount of time, you barge past everyone and into the nurse's office.
The resident nurse at the school was a very hot way out for you.
She was in a winter nurse's uniform.

The nurse's main turn-on was her height, roughly three-quarters of a foot taller than your host, at about the same age as Justin Webb really was. Most of that heigh in her unnaturally long, pale, skinny legs which became tiny at her delicate feet and ankles, but wide at the hips and upper thighs. Her white skirt was just hovering above knee length. She never wore tights though, always keeping her nice legs on parade. In fact, she was never seen to be wearing any form of sock at all under her modest little flats.
From her somewhat noticeably curved pelvis, her belly was noticeably absent, as if that of an underweight model or something like that. Yet her breasts had to be fake. Padded. Fake. No woman had such large cups, easily an E or F cup, not unlikely a size larger than that either.
Her hair was dyed ash blond and tucked into a fishnet bun under her white hat.
Her face was very small and round, with an understated grin often on her face corresponding to her fun-loving personality. She wasn't as slutty as some of the jealous girls in your year seemed to suggest (subjectively).

You presumed that because your powers may have been affected by an external interference, you ought to take precautions as if the FBI had found you and were after you. As you were carrying Jennifer, anyone looking for you that were trained to identify the bodies you had previously used. You needed another. Emily's was the easiest to take and you deftly used that body and confusion around it to your advantage, by disguising it as the body the authorities would be searching for. Therefore, if you came across anyone taking too much interest in unconscious decoy-Jennifer, they were definitely FBI sent after you.

Your plan was to copy this woman's body, knock out the old version and hide her and Emily away in that room somewhere so that they would come to when you were long out of there in Nursey's car. There, you could find a new life and make records and start over.

You drop Emily on the table, begin to copy the nurse's body and pick up a tranquillising syringe. You hesitate.

What if nobody was after you at all? What if it was all in your head and the powers, the side effects of those chemicals, were naturally fading and using the aforementioned powers only made you more liable to lose them at a more sudden rate??
If you had no powers, then what? Then it was game over, all because you had strained yourself over some dumb fantasy. Maybe the coin was the butterfly effect nudging you over the end of some tether and setting off a delayed chain reaction. Chemistry, that was all this was, un-researched Chemistry.
11211.title: Isolate, subdue and replace Emily

1122.content:
As Gym ended, you and the other girls went back to the locker room, you strip to your underwear, and then being clever, you shape shift your body but making no noticeable changes, you remove all your sweat, and clean yourself up, you change into your regular bra, and your jeans and polo, brushing out your hair, you redo your slight makeup at the mirror.

All the other girls wonder how you always look so good directly after gym, but you can't exactly tell them that you're a shape shifter.

You head on to your next class...

===============================

At the end of the day, you head out to your car, momentarily confused as to where you parked since that jerk was in your spot, but easily remembering. you head home, do you have any plans for the rest of the day
1122.title: After Gym

112221.content:
You get home and drop off your school supplies, You then shape shifted into 35 year old but looks 22 year old body of your 'Mother' or atleast the character of Jennifer's Mother.

Hannah, had DD-cup breasts was only 5'4 and had a perfect hourglass waist, She was designed to appear as a beautiful trophy wife, Let's just say when you were busy creating this fake family for yourself, you hadn't anticipated how often you'd be living as Hannah.

You spent 5 days a week after school Working at Hooters as Hannah.

You shifted your clothes into Hannah's work uniform, a tiny white Tank-top and tiny orange booty-shorts, and hop in your car and head into town.
112221.title: Waitress

choices: Pursued him to see where he was going
1122211.content: When i got to work at the restraunt, which was dennys,i headed into dennys and checkd myself in.i then started takeing orders.a few minutes later this guy came in.he had a big bushy grey mustache and he was wearing jeans,a black shirt,and a black jacket.he had a brown hat.he sat down at a table and i went to take his order,hey babe he said.i tried to remain calm because this dude was probalbly on drugs.i hate men like that i thought to myself.anyways i did the waitress thing,like how may i take your order.he ordered a burger and some fries.a couple hours later he was still there,now i was sucpicous,it was the end of my shift and before i left the dude left,right before he walked out the front door i thought i sawhis mustache shrink and his facial fetures move.now i was definetly suspicous.i walked out the front door and
1122211.title: Work

1123.content:
You have a choice between going offsite to practise gymnastics or go outside and participate in group sports as it was sunny that day.
There were several perks of being a shapeshifter that you knew you shouldn't use as much as you did, on of those was this: in the palm of your hand, you materialise a coin... you glance at it... tails. Sounds like you were staying on-site.
You say goodbye to your friends as they wave you goodbye before shuffling slowly to the school play-field.
The girls left behind were excited and talkative, trying to figure out what sports they might be doing. You loitered way behind on the way there, minding your own business when the Earth seemed to shake and spin... and shake and spin... and shake and spin and then spin and shake and.
You were a guy.
You were 21 year old Justin Webb.
You were 21 year old Justin Webb wearing the clothes of 17 year old Jennifer Wesker, a girl.
Nobody seemed to notice the disappearance of Jennifer, but your friend Emily, who was the only person walking behind you was the first to notice you, a guy, out of place and sticking out due to your girl's uniform. You morph back into Jennifer, unsure of why your powers had malfunctioned like this.

What to do about Emily?
1123.title: Something else

info.brief_description: Living on your own isn't as dull when you have the ability to shapeshift.
info.description:
Your name is Justin Webb.
Or, rather, it was.
You would be 21 right now if nothing out of the ordinary happened.
But something did happen.

It's been three years since the incident that changed your life forever.

Three years ago your family had a car accident: a drunk driver ran into your family's car while going back home from a vacation. The driver previously stole a truck that contained newly found chemicals in the back. The crash leaked the chemicals onto the site of the accident.

The FBI cleaned up everything and erased the very existence of you or your family in order for them to research what the chemicals did on humans.

Unfortunately, the chemicals resulted in death to everyone, and somehow temporarily put your body into a state that perfectly mimics death.

Scientists gave up on the project and got rid of the bodies. Before they can dispose of you, you woke up and ran from the facility.

Fearing that the government is on the hunt for you, you started hiding out in empty houses. It was at one house you were squatting in that you learned these chemicals gave you an ability unlike any other.

You had the ability to shapeshift. You could turn into anyone just by thinking about it, right down to the DNA structure. The clothing you wore even changes as well, and whatever they had on their person. Peoples wallets and purses would be perfectly replicated, leaving you to have everything they had without them even knowing you did.

You ended up using this to your advantage and built a new life for yourself. It's been three years and you're now living a life ten times better then you recently had.

The government has given up on the search for you and have declared Justin Webb to be deceased.

You now live in a nice two story house in the suburbs, blending in with everyone else.
You even made a new identity for yourself, which you came up with after dozens of trial and error.

You're now Jennifer Wesker. 17, and a sophomore in high school. You have average grades, nothing spectacular. You're even in the cheerleading squad.

As to not make yourself stand out, you created a new family for Jennifer, and periodically go out as an adult male, female, or a 14 year old version of the real you, to make it seem like a family does live there.

You're now living a normal life, and everything seems to be perfect, save for the average teenage drama you get to enjoy again.
Fortunately, the government doesn't even know of your actions.

But, something that, for some reason hasn't crossed your mind, is going on.

What happened to the drunk driver?
Well, let's just say you're not the only one with the ability to shapeshift.

This is your story.
